result.reason: Application throws an unhandled exception when the configured connection file path points to an unmapped network drive because File.GetLastWriteTimeUtc(), File.Exists(), and FileSystemWatcher calls lack network-specific error handling.
result.approach: Wrap file I/O calls in Runtime.cs (LoadConnections) and FileDataProvider with try/catch for IOException/UnauthorizedAccessException, show a user-friendly dialog explaining the network path is unreachable, and fall back to the default local connections file.
